DOC.brief_title: The Impact Online Quiz-games Nutrition Knowledge Related Outcomes Among University Students .
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention randomized-controlled trial two data collection point : one begin one end study . The study include healthy student two UK Universities , randomly assign either intervention control group . Participants group ask undertake measurement complete questionnaire study . Measurements include assessment BMI , body fat , lean mass , waist-to-hip ratio , systolic diastolic blood pressure blood glucose . In addition , nutrition knowledge dietary habit estimate use online questionnaire well level physical activity use IPAQ questionnaire pedometer . Participants intervention group receive access educational website include information fruit vegetable , fat , sugar , fast-food , meat , salt , meal snack , food label , exercise , alcohol . Each category link online quiz-game include question related topic . Students ask play game much want improve knowledge score . Access website game available 10 week . Participants control group receive intervention . After 10 week , participant ask undertake measurement complete questionnaire begin study . The study aim investigate effectiveness online educational intervention , use game element , level nutrition knowledge student , well , whether change knowledge impact change dietary habit , physical activity weight-related factor .
